name: Package size control
description: A Package should not have more than X and less than Y Public Classes/interfaces. The parameters X and Y, maximum number and minimum number can be customized at will.
output:
This report lists all Packages having more than X and less than Y Public Classes or Interfaces.
It provides the following information:
 - Package full name
 - Number of Classes and Interfaces
rationale: Packages must have a reasonable size when measured in number of Classes/interfaces.
